title: My Clubs are gone and I can't send gifts
body: I logged into league this morning to gift my whiny brother the new lux skin to find out that it is, "currently unavailable" that was 14 hours ago. And now, just 10 minutes ago all my clubs disappeared. Can somebody tell me what the hell is going on?

replies.body:
Two issues here, so let's address them separately:

1. Clubs is a feature that's still being wonky, but if you write a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in, we'll be able to work with you to resolve this.

2. Gifting isn't available in the *Beta Client*, but you can access gifting from the *Legacy Client*, which you can access from the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have additional questions.
